discourse_list.title: xDAI the solution for cost-effective adoption of DAI?

content.content: With the recent increase of network fees on Ethereum, many common day-to-day users, it becomes impossible to use DAI ERC-20, many users in the DAI Venezuela Telegram group, have been given the task of slowly migrating to use this sidechain that natively uses DAI as their network currency. We understand, the common user suffers before the monstrous gas commissions. Do you think this is the solution for common users?

In my opinion yes, if your goal is to buy and hold (and/or send/receive) DAI.
